name: Toybit Quest
description: Toybit Quest is a dungeon crawler/rogue-lite with endless levels, unique toy enemies, a vast skill tree, and tons of loot and gear to find! It draws inspiration from Diablo, Binding of Isaac, and the Legend of Zelda.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Storage: 12 MB available space
